The DO-III Expulsion fuse link is an oil-immersed, expulsion-type, fuse assembly for use in the DO-III draw-out load break expulsion fuse holder or equivalent. It is designed for use with single and three-phase pad-mounted transformers filled with transformer oil or other approved fluid.  The DO-III expulsion fuse link is designed to protect the distribution system in the event of an internal transformer fault, secondary fault, or severe overload.
